code: /** @format */import React from"react";import{useDispatch}from"react-redux";import{Button,Card,Col,Row}from"react-bootstrap";import{activateForm,activateUrl,deactivateUrl}from"../../slices/form.slice";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var GettingStarted=function GettingStarted(){var dispatch=useDispatch();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Row,{className:"justify-content-center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{md:4,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{style:{marginTop:"6rem"},className:"text-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Header,{children:"Getting Started"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card.Body,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Title,{style:{marginBottom:"0.5rem"},children:"Create New Recipe"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Text,{style:{marginBottom:"1.5rem"},children:"Get started by creating a recipe"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"outline-primary",onClick:function onClick(){dispatch(activateForm());dispatch(activateUrl());},style:{marginRight:"0.25rem",marginBottom:"1rem"},children:"allrecipes.com"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"outline-dark",onClick:function onClick(){dispatch(activateForm());dispatch(deactivateUrl());},style:{marginLeft:"0.25rem",marginBottom:"1rem"},children:"from scratch"})]})]})})});};export default GettingStarted;
